Title: mPass
Description: mPass is a WinRT and Windows Phone 8 version of KeePass, a free and easy to use password manager.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
mPass is a WinRT and Windows Phone 8 version of KeePass, a free and easy to use password manager.

Status
  • KeePassLib is mostly ported to WinRT (loading .kbdx files mostly works, still have to port saving)
  • Starting to work on the WinRT UI.
